history.description: a timeline of your life history

job-bullet-items.bullet-item: Led the corporate financial reporting initiatives using [AWS Redshift] [OLAP] with [Tableau].
Coordinated with business stakeholders to refine requirements for financial reporting initiatives, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.
Worked extensively with [SQL], [Amazon Glue], [S3], [Data Lake], [Lambda], [REST], [API Gateway], and [Postman[ to develop and maintain data solutions.

Participated in [Agile] [SDLC] and [CI/CD] practices, using [Jira], [Jenkins] with [Backlog Refinement], [Sprint Planning], [Daily Scrums], and bi-weekly [Sprint Reviews], and [Spring Retrospectives], while coordinating with [Procuct Owner], and other project groups.

Amplified corporate security by upgrading internal services to fetch credentials from [CyberArk] Identify Security and Access Management service at runtime. Avoiding the need to update credentials stored in local files reduced password rollover costs by 95%.
Engineered [Python] [REST API] enabling credential retrieval using [mutual TLS/SSL authentication] via [AWS API Gateway].

Modernized apps via [Jenkins CI/CD] pipeline upgrade, integrating [SetupTools], [Artifactory/PyPI], [SonarQube], and [Xray] resulting in faster deployment times and metrics used to improve code quality.

Developed high-volume data pipeline ingress and integrations, enabling efficient [game telemetry] and [user profile data] transfer between WB-distributed games and leading marketing platforms using [Segment] CDP, [Kafka], [Redshift], [Glue], and [Airflow].

Utilized PySpark for ETL/ELT (“Extract, Load, Transform”) processes and Python for third-party integrations and dev-ops collaborations with Jenkins, DataDog, and ZenDesk. Leveraged Google BigQuery, SalesForce, Aurora/PostgreSQL, Amazon Glue, and Lambda.
Conducted exploration and statistical analysis of marketing data with [Python], [Pandas], and [Seaborn] and tested structured data storage/retrieval capabilities of [GraphQL].
Used [AWS SageMaker], [Python], and Machine Learning packages, [Pytorch] and [Keras], to build and optimize a [supervised CNN] for classifying movie frames from video episodes stored in [S3].
Earned certifications in [Advanced Learning Algorithms[, [Advanced SQL for Data Scientists], and [Supervised Machine Learning: Regression & Classification], boosting professional skills.
Practiced advanced data exploration and machine learning algorithms using [Python], [Pandas, [NumPy], [SciPy], [Scikit-learn], [Plotly], and [Seaborn].
Innovated effective [business intelligence] [strategies] using [Snowflake], [Looker], and [Tableau] for comprehensive [corporate finance reporting].
